vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
καταναρκάομαι,
Ionic dialect καταναρκ-έομαι, passive, grow quite numb, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; to be reduced to a torpid condition, [Refs 1st c.BC+]
__II active, καταναρκᾶν τινος to be slothful towards, press heavily upon.. , [NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to burden, be a burden
in NT to be burdensome to the disadvantage of any one, to be a dead weight upon; by implication to be troublesome, burdensome to, in respect of maintenance, 2Cor. 11:9; 12:13, 14*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 原意: 僵硬, 麻木
2) 重壓, 成為負擔 (林後11:9;林後12:13,14)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 原意: 僵硬, 麻木
2) 重压, 成为负担 (林后11:9;林后12:13,14)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: là một gánh nặng; làm phiền
